page.title: 06Health in Aby Area
page.content: All catered for under{N.H.S.}In general physical health in all ages is good. Stress, pollution - low. Home grown food available. Children birth to 16, cared for by{G.P.}to 5 years & allied with school nurses & doctors onwards. Preventative measures against infection are general (poliomyeliitis, whooping cough) parents co-operate with doctors. Free medicine is provided for children & old people. Facilities for mental treatment are out of this area but available. School{dentists}treat scholars, who are also allowed private treatment. Part of the cost for others is born by the patient. Allied with health services are ambulance, {district nurses,}occupational therapy, chiropody, social welfare, including houses for the elderly. These available on a regional basis.
